QuestData.Title: Nithogg's Tribute
QuestData.Description:
It looks like the ravenbears have started gathering materials for some sort of tribute, but the storm drakes are keeping them from finishing what they started.
From the looks of it, they're gathering fully intact stag horns and long tail feathers from the greatstags and eagles nearby.
It shouldn't take too long to gather the rest of what they need.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect 8 Intact Greatstag Antlers and 16 Pristine Eagle Tailfeathers in the Stormtorn Foothills.
QuestData.RewardText: Caw! Caw! $B$B<The ravenbear chieftain flaps his wings excitedly when he sees the reagents you've brought.>
